articles.author: Emma Tucker, CNN
articles.title: DOJ charges 13 alleged members of violent Chicago gang in federal indictment
articles.description: The Department of Justice has charged 13 members of a Chicago street gang faction with racketeering conspiracy as part of a federal indictment related to dozens of murders, attempted murders and acts of violence spanning more than 20 years.
articles.content: (CNN)The Department of Justice has charged 13 members of a Chicago street gang faction with racketeering conspiracy as part of a federal indictment related to dozens of murders, attempted murders and… [+2448 chars]

articles.author: Travis Caldwell, Joe Sutton, Keith Allen and Kelly McCleary, CNN
articles.title: What we know about what happened at the Wisconsin Christmas parade
articles.description: The celebratory sounds of a Wisconsin Christmas parade were interrupted by terrified screams Sunday after a vehicle plowed into participants and spectators gathered for the event in Waukesha, a city about 20 miles west of downtown Milwaukee.
